item.title: Dumped car, 26th August
item.description:
This car has been dumped on our street for over a month now. The owners have moved out of the property and removed the number plate from the dash board on the day of moving out. It is occupying two car park spaces on a busy street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Radnor Avenue, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bush overgrown blocking access, 26th August
item.description:
Bush overgrown now blocking pavement access to those in wheelchairs or with buggies. Please trim back. Believe this belongs to a council run property.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tuskar Street, East Greenwich, London

item.title: Every column between the shops has been tagged, 26th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Peckham, London

item.title: Fence badly damaged, multiple holes. Needs replacing., 26th August
item.description:
Please can this fence be replaced, it's been beyond repair for many years now. huge holes throughout out and baldy rusted.

item.title: Smells from road drain, 26th August
item.description:

item.title: Scrap Motorbike and parts dumped on street, 26th August
item.description:

item.title: Overflowing bin, 26th August
item.description:
This has been reported several times. I have received notification that it’s been fixed but it hasn’t. There is rubbish all over the street and the mess from the pigeons under the railway bridge needs cleaning.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmers End Road, Anerley, London

item.title: Severely overhanging vegetation, 26th August
item.description:
The vegetation from this private land is severely encroaching on to the pavement making it difficult to walk and push buggies without bushes coming in the way. There are also issues with overhanging vegetation further up this road all the way to the station (I am not sure is this is private or public land).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Anerley Park, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Metal Barrier fallen over by damage slide, 26th August
item.description:
The metal barriers surrounding the damaged pyramid slide had been bent over and damaged and so needs removing and replacing please. The slide still needs to be repaired it’s been damaged over 6 months now since it was damaged.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Main Road, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime bikes totally unregulated, 26th August
item.description:
A huge number of lime bikes are parked incorrectly on Hazelbourne road. Users are just leaving these bikes wherever they want - this photo shows bikes parked out of the designated e-bike parking space and are using spaces for motorists

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Balham Hill, Balham, London
